Statute.Title: Government Organization Act, Atlantic Canada, 1987
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Loi organique de 1987 sur le Canada atlantique)

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 41 (4th Supp.), ss. 1 to 24, 45, 53 to 56 in force 15.09.88 see SI/88‑152; ss. 25 to 44 and 46 to 51 in force 01.12.88 see SI/88‑140; s. 52 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
CIF, 1992, c. 1, ss. 9 and 10 in force on assent 28.02.92
CIF, 1995, c. 29, ss. 2 and 3 in force 01.11.95 see SI/95‑115
